channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team leave the farm in search of work and head to the coast to reap the ocean's bounty.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Eastergate to design a contemporary garden for Rob and Helen with space for them to entertain.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Alan Cumming's Edge of Scotland
channel.desc: Scottish-born actor Alan Cumming explores the picturesque Outer Hebrides of Scotland, touring the Western Isles from Barra to Stornoway on Lewis, Eriskay and the Callanish stones.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: From Bournemouth to Dundee, Alice meets 'cam' couples who are monetising their sex lives by retailing 'authentic sex' online. Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hussy
channel.desc: Helen Mirren stars as a sex worker who begins an affair with a shady colleague at their high-class London cabaret. Can their relationship survive? Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Au Pair Girls
channel.desc: Seventies film following the misadventures of four female au pairs who arrive at Heathrow Airport and are whisked off to work for different families. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.title: Weekend Millionaires
channel.desc: An oral history of Britain's most famous river; focusing on the Lightermen and Watermen who have worked on the Thames from the 1960s to today.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Bristol to create a Mediterranean-inspired space that will rekindle happy holiday memories for young couple Emily and Maurice.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Boatyards On the Thames
channel.desc: An oral history of Boatyards on the tidal Thames as told by boat builders and boatyard owners. Produced by Digital Works.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Richard Wilson's Highland Fling
channel.desc: Richard returns to Scotland to embark on tour of the Highlands and Islands. The journey offers him the opportunity to discover more about his homeland and reflect on his life.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Alan Cumming's Edge of Scotland
channel.desc: Scottish-born actor Alan Cumming explores the picturesque Outer Hebrides of Scotland, touring the Western Isles from Barra to Stornoway on Lewis, Eriskay and the Callanish stones.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Odd Job
channel.desc: Comedy. A despondent man hires a professional assassin to take himself out. Stars David Jason and Monty Python's Graham Chapman.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Commandos
channel.desc: Action. World War II. Allied commandos are parachuted into North Africa on a mission to infiltrate and hold an Axis-held fort until reinforcements arrive. Lee Van Cleef stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Heartbreakers
channel.desc: Comedy. A brilliant mother and daughter con team have their grift down to a fine art. Starring Sigourney Weaver, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Gene Hackman and Ray Liotta.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: In Wales and a London dungeon, Alice explores the world of BDSM. She also meets a Surrey couple where the dom 'owns' her sub's body 24/7. Contains scenes of a sexual nature.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Let's Get Laid
channel.desc: Gordon Laid is a soldier returning to London after WW2. He gets mixed up in a series of murders and mistaken identities. Bawdy romp with Robin Askwith. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Groupie Girl
channel.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Me and My Affair
channel.desc: Stories of people who have experienced infidelity, the reasons why people stray outside their relationship and if a relationship can ever survive.

channel.title: Stuart Farm

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Swinging London Session Musicians
channel.desc: A history of London's Session Musicians, sharing their memories and experiences from the 50s and 60s onwards across the musical spectrum, from rock and pop to reggae and classical.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler battle it out to make the most money. Roo Irvine, Gary Barton and Kevin Paxton head to St Andrews.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Explaining the difference between 'use by', 'best before' and 'display until,' the safety of supermarket pork and the challenges facing Scottish salmon.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is February and archaeologists Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn and historian Ruth Goodman approach the halfway point in their year on the Edwardian Farm.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Stuart Farm
channel.desc: 7 / 12. Five archaeologists and historians run a farm for a year as it would have been in the reign of King James I. March, and they get busy turning wheat into bread flour.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Reel Stories
channel.desc: Cinema projectionists make magic with light. As digital projection makes them obsolete, this film records the working lives of projectionists in the heyday of this dying art.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Stefan reports on the safety of American chlorinated chicken. Sian learns about the side effects of detox teas. Food made from insects too.
